title: Authors and Citation
text: Kajasilta H (2026). PEcAn.LDNDC: PEcAn package integration LDNDC model. R package version 1.0.2, https://pecanproject.github.io.
code: @Manual{,   title = {PEcAn.LDNDC: PEcAn package for integration of the LDNDC model},   author = {Henri Kajasilta},   year = {2026},   note = {R package version 1.0.2},   url = {https://pecanproject.github.io}, }

title: PEcAn package for integration of the LDNDC model
text: --date information LandscapeDNDC can found , well authors,  users guide documentation model: https://ldndc.imk-ifu.kit.edu/index.php Obtaining LDNDC program requires credentials, one able request  authors model. credentials, pre-compiled LDNDC program can  downloaded : https://ldndc.imk-ifu.kit.edu/download/download-model.php Instructions setting LDNDC simulations described users guide.

title: PEcAn package for integration of the LDNDC model
text: Corresponding author: Henri Kajasilta  Contact email: henri.kajasilta@fmi.fi

title: Write LDNDC met files — met2model.LDNDC
text: Converts met CF file model specific met file. input files calld <.path>/<.prefix>.YYYY.cf

title: Write LDNDC met files — met2model.LDNDC
code: met2model.LDNDC(   in.path,   in.prefix,   outfolder,   start_date,   end_date,   overwrite = FALSE,   ... )

title: Write LDNDC met files — met2model.LDNDC
text: .path path disk CF file lives .prefix prefix file outfolder location model specific output written. start_date start date results end_date end date results overwrite logical: replace output files already exist? ... arguments

what: Code to convert LDNDC's output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.LDNDC
title: Code to convert LDNDC's output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.LDNDC
text: Convert LDNDC output NACP Intercomparison format (ALMA using netCDF)

title: Code to convert LDNDC's output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.LDNDC
code: model2netcdf.LDNDC(   outdir,   sitelat,   sitelon,   start_date,   end_date,   delete.raw = FALSE )

title: Code to convert LDNDC's output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.LDNDC
text: outdir Location model output sitelat Latitude site sitelon Longitude site start_date Start time simulation end_date End time simulation delete.raw TRUE raw model results deleted

title: Code to convert LDNDC's output into netCDF format — model2netcdf.LDNDC
Write LDNDC configuration files — write.config.LDNDC
text: defaults list defaults process trait.values vector samples given trait settings list settings pecan settings file run.id id run

title: Write LDNDC configuration files — write.config.LDNDC
text: Requires pft xml object, list trait values single model run, name file create

title: PEcAn.LDNDC 1.0.2
text: model2netcdf.LDNDC longer writes separate <year>.nc.var files every year output. Use PEcAn.utils::nc_write_varfiles() create needed.

title: PEcAn.LDNDC 1.0.1
text: PEcAn.LDNDC now distributed BSD three-clause license instead NCSA Open Source license.
